embed.title: Assign yourself some roles!
embed.content:
Click buttons below to assign yourself some roles! These aren't mandatory, but we encourage them.
════════

field.title: PRONOUNS
field.content:
Pronoun roles help others learn how to refer to you.
:female_sign: She/Her :male_sign: He/Him <:flag_nonbinary:776548637773660170> They/Them
